    Technische Universität Kaiserslautern (TUK)

    Kaiserslautern, Germany
    2019-2021 (expected)
    Grade: Pending ✝

    Summary of Coursework

    A short introduction of my senior project, and a list of all the courses I studied in this degree, and my final grade in each course.

    Intelligent Systems

    • 2D Image Processing
    • 3D Computer Vision
    • Applications of Machine Learning and Data Science
    • Machine Learning 1: Foundations
    • Methods for Modeling and Capturing Human Motion
    • Very Deep Learning
    • Seminar: Image Processing and Augmented Reality

    Software Engineering

    • Automotive Software and Systems Engineering
    • Foundations of Software Engineering
    • Requirements Engineering
    • Product Line Engineering
    • Safety & Reliability of Embedded Systems
    • Software Quality Assurance
    • System and Software Architecture

    Visualization and Scientific Computing

    • Data Visualization
    • Human-Computer Interaction
    • Scientific Visualization

    Miscellaneous

    • Complexity Theory
    • German Language A1

    Grading Scheme

    TU Kaiserslautern grades on a scale of 1 to 5, with the following distribution:
    • 1.0–1.5 very good
    • 1.6–2.5 good
    • 2.6–3.5 satisfactory
    • 3.6–4.0 sufficient
    • 5.0 not sufficient
